headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data: https://a.tile.openstreetmap.org https://c.tile.openstreetmap.org https://b.tile.openstreetmap.org; connect-src 'self' https://sepolia.base.org wss://relay.walletconnect.com wss://www.walletlink.org/rpc; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
